question: How to reset password?
answer: Click the Forgot Password option and follow instructions.

question: What is the refund policy?
answer: Refunds are processed within 7 business days after approval.

question: How to contact support?
answer: You can email support@company.com or chat with our bot.

question: How to track my order?
answer: Log in and go to Orders > Track Order.

question: Is cash on delivery available?
answer: Yes, COD is available for selected locations.

question: How do I cancel my order?
answer: Go to Orders > Select Order > Cancel. Cancellation is allowed until the item is shipped.

question: Why was my payment deducted but order not placed?
answer: If the amount is debited but order not created, the money will be refunded automatically within 3–5 working days.

question: How to change delivery address?
answer: You can update the delivery address before the order is shipped from the Orders page.

question: Do you provide gift wrapping?
answer: Yes, gift wrapping is available for selected products at checkout.

question: Can I reschedule my delivery?
answer: Yes, you can reschedule via the Delivery Partner link shared on SMS/Email.

question: How to apply a coupon code?
answer: Enter the coupon code on the checkout page before payment.

question: Why is my coupon not working?
answer: Coupons have terms. Ensure your order meets the minimum value and category restrictions.

question: Is EMI available?
answer: Yes, EMI options are available on eligible products based on bank rules.

question: What payment methods are accepted?
answer: We accept UPI, Debit/Credit Cards, Net Banking, Wallets, and COD.

question: Why is my order delayed?
answer: Unexpected logistics delays may occur. You can check live updates in Orders > Track Order.

question: How to return a product?
answer: Go to Orders > Select Order > Return. Follow the pickup instructions.

question: What items are not eligible for return?
answer: Certain categories like innerwear, health essentials, and customized products are non-returnable.

question: How long does the return pickup take?
answer: Return pickups are usually completed within 48–72 hours.

question: When will I receive replacement?
answer: Replacement will be processed once the returned item is quality checked.

question: Can I change the payment mode after placing the order?
answer: No, payment mode cannot be changed after the order is placed.

question: How to update my phone number?
answer: Go to My Profile > Edit Profile to update phone number and email.

question: How to delete my account?
answer: You can request account deletion by sending an email to support@company.com.

question: Why am I not receiving OTP?
answer: Ensure network availability and check spam/blocked messages. Try resending OTP after 1 minute.

question: How to unsubscribe from marketing emails?
answer: Click the unsubscribe link at the bottom of any promotional email.

question: How to check my wallet balance?
answer: Go to My Account > Wallet to view your available balance.

question: Why is my order marked as delivered but I did not receive it?
answer: Please wait 24 hours as we sometimes receive delayed status updates. If not resolved, contact support for investigation.

question: Can someone else collect my order?
answer: Yes, family members and neighbors can collect the order if they confirm the OTP to the delivery agent.

question: Do you offer installation services?
answer: Installation is available for selected appliances and furniture and will be arranged after delivery.

question: Do products come with warranty?
answer: Manufacturer warranty applies to eligible products. Warranty details are mentioned on the product page.

question: Can I request a callback from support?
answer: Yes, you can request a callback using the Contact Support form.

question: What are your customer support hours?
answer: Support is available from 9 AM to 9 PM on weekdays and 10 AM to 6 PM on weekends.

question: Are international deliveries available?
answer: Currently international delivery is not supported; we only deliver within India.

question: Why was my return request rejected?
answer: Return requests may be rejected if the item is damaged, used, or missing accessories.

question: Do you store my payment information?
answer: We do not store CVV or card data. All payments are processed securely through certified payment gateways.

question: How to download invoice for my order?
answer: Go to Orders > Select Order > Download Invoice.
